remarks: Part of proof of Lemma C in [Crawley] p. 112.  TODO: shorten with ~ atmod3i1 ?  (Contributed by NM, 29-May-2012.)
statement:
cdlemc1.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
cdlemc1.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
cdlemc1.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
cdlemc1.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
cdlemc1.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
cdlemc1.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
cdlemc1 $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ X e. B /\ ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) ) -> ( P .\/ ( ( P .\/ X ) ./\ W ) ) = ( P .\/ X ) ) $.
